QuestData.Title: The Power of Poison
QuestData.Description: G.V.? We need a name and a location. Not damned initials.$B$B<Velonara pulls out a small vial.>$B$BThis is my last vial of wracking poison. We use it to extract information from prisoners. It is... potent.$B$BCoat your weapon with it and head into the Shattered Hand camp just ahead. Engage them as normal and demand answers - the poison will take care of the rest. I've had enough of these orcs.
QuestData.LogDescription: Interrogate Shattered Hand orcs in the Harvesting Pits to find out the name and location of "G.V.".

Objectives.Objective: Name and location of G.V. learned
